name: Zombie game shooter
description:
W,A,S and D keys to move, left mouse click to shoot, number keys to switch weapon and R to reset zombies

Hi, This is a small project I've been working on for maybe two weeks? It has taken me alot of effort to make then game and then upload it to Itch.io. I would appreciate it if you left a comment, Checked out my tiktok or even left a donation! Enjoy.
